title: Razer Taipan Side Keys No Longer Work in LoL
body:
Salutations,

For a while I had been using the side buttons on my mouse for on my way and missing pings. But a few months ago it suddenly stopped working.

The keys still function perfectly in other tasks and only League of Legends seems to be effected.

Thank you for the help.

Best regards!

replies.body: Heya, your extra mouse keys may not work if you updated to Windows Creator.  We don't have any info or updates now on a more permanent fix, but a current workaround would be to rollback that update.  Though I totally understand if that might not be worth it!  I hope that helps clear things up.
